skills.name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
skills.descriptionraw: Randomly summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122010]</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of $[C122010] can exist at the same time in the summons area).
skills.descriptionreplaced: Randomly summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Oceanid Mimic</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).
skills.description: Randomly summons 1 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).

skills.name: The Myriad Wilds

skills.descriptionreplaced: Randomly summons 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Oceanid Mimic</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).
skills.description: Randomly summons 2 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones, at most 2 types of Oceanid Mimic can exist at the same time in the summons area).

skills.name: Tide and Torrent
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +1 additional DMG.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +1 additional DMG.
skills.description: Deals 4 Hydro DMG. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +1 additional DMG.

skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Hydro
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C132041]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Lifeform: Hydro</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Elemental Lifeform: Hydro.
